text: Is there documentation on the visibility options for fields.json that im missing? I cant seem to find it. Particularly conditional logic. If not, would be cool to have a bit more detail :)

Also I think it’d be a nice editing and developer experience if the Image field had some additional settings which made it easier for the editor to specify different sizes of images at specified responsive breakpoints rather than the two current options of either building this yourself (multiple image fields), or pot luck using the resize_image_url.
this is an interesting idea, can you post to the community on this with some more details and then link it back here in this channel. I’ll pass it along to some folks internally
Expanded on it, I think it’d tie in perfectly with the recent theme breakpoint functionality you released.

Just like the new async arguments added to the `require_css` function, it would be nice to have some sort of async option in modules. Currently, pages have 20+ render blocking css files and I’d like control in the module’s `meta.json` file to add something like `css_async: true`

<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Add-css-async-option-to-module-s-meta-json-file/idi-p/412977|Upvote the idea here>.
